description: Purple Haze UI Theme: Complete redesign of login, authentication, and library screens with dark purple-blue background, smooth scale-on-focus animations, and blue accent highlighting
Enhanced Animations: Added smooth scale animations to all poster components across home, libraries, Jellyseerr, and search screens
Theme Music Player: Automatic theme music playback on Movie and TV Show detail screens with auto-play toggle in settings (MUST have theme.mp3 in media folder)
Video Player Updates: Redesigned controls to match other Moonfin clients
Jellyseerr Improvements: Proper user session management across profile changes, enhanced error handling, improved authentication, and better season request dialog styling
Navigation Fixes: Fixed UP key navigation to navbar, improved item re-selection when returning from details, added 'Go To Series' button on episode details
Backdrop Controls: User-configurable backdrop blur intensity with separate toggles for home/Jellyseerr and detail screens
Bug Fixes: Fixed unresponsive play button from genres, media bar overlay visibility, duplicate items in libraries, and overview text restrictions
Upstream Updates: Merged multiple updates from jellyfin/jellyfin-roku including bug fixes, French translations, and dependency updates (roku-deploy 3.x)
Special thanks to the Jellyfin Roku upstream project and all contributors!
author: Mr Moonfin - @RadicalMuffinMan on GitHub
